info.author: Brandon DeRosier
info.description:
gcreate
============

A command-line utility to bootstrap GitHub repositories with labels and
webhooks.

Installation
------------

To get the latest stable release from PyPi

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install gcreate

To get the latest commit from GitHub

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install -e git+git://github.com/bdero/gcreate.git#egg=gcreate

Generate an initial configuration in ``$HOME/.gcreate`` and modify it

.. code-block:: bash

    gcreate init
    vi ~/.gcreate  # Configuration directions are located inside

Release Notes
-------------

No releases yet.
